thread.section_title: GermanSteins.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of GermanSteins.com | germansteins.com
thread.title: Chris A from Seattle
thread.title_full: GermanSteins.com reviewed by Chris A from Seattle

author: Chris A from Seattle
title: Chris A from Seattle
text: I recently ordered 2 steins from German Steins. The email communication was timely to confirm my order, I received an email with package tracking information once the order shipped, and the steins themselves arrived per the schedule in perfect condition. Everything as expected.
